multiple-choice.question: Let $S = \{1,2,3,4,5,6,7\}$. You choose a uniformly random 3-element subset $X$ of $S$. Thus, each 3-element subset of $S$ has a probability of $\left. 1 \middle/ {7 \choose 3} \right.$ of being $X$. Define the event [defs] A = "4 is an element of $X$". [/defs] What is $\Pr(A)$?
